Science Library¶

CWITools Science Functions Library.

This module contains functions for use in scientific analysis or the generation of scientific products from data cubes (such as pseudo-NarrowBand images).

pseudo_nb(inpFits, center, bandwidth[, …])

Create a pseudo-Narrow-Band (pNB) image from a data cube.

nonpos2inf(cube[, level])

Replace values below a certain threshold with infinity.

fwhm2sigma(fwhm)

Convert a gaussian Full-Width at Half Maximum to a standard deviation.

get_pkpc_px(wcs2d[, redshift])

Return the physical size of pixels in proper kpc.

smooth3d(cube, scale[, axes, ktype, var])

Smooth along all/any axes of a data cube with a box or gaussian kernel.
